name: Sword
long_description: A rusty sword. Doesn't really fit in your bag.

name: Potion
long_description: A red potion that has "POTION" written across it. (+40 health)

name: Damage-Up
long_description: An orange potion that has "DAMAGE UP" written across it. (x1.2 damage)

name: Trident
long_description: A sharp three pronged weapon. You could make like, at least two roasted marshmallows.

name: Gold Key
long_description: A super shiny key! Probably unlocks a door, but what do I know.

name: Shuttle Pass
long_description: A blue pass to ride the shuttle. The road awaits!

name: Dagger
long_description: A trusty dagger that fits in your back pocket.

name: Gauntlets
long_description: Reliable Gauntlets will help you attack harder.
